realm.name: Consumer
realm.description:
It is a plain user of a market place. The role only includes a user role. It is a default role for all registered user.
It is a more specific role than user, because a role will exist that will not be a consumer.

realm.name: Manager
realm.description:
It is a simple role. The role indicates a user as manager. The role includes a consumer role.
In future the role maybe include more privileged roles.

realm.name: Reader
realm.description: It is a simple role. The role indicates a user can read a content.

realm.name: Manager-content
realm.description: It is a complex and more specific role of a manager. This user controls content flow. The role permits to create a new content now. In future the role also will allow to update, delete a content. The role includes a plain manager and a writer roles.

realm.name: User
realm.description: It is a plain user role. Include a Reader role.

realm.name: Writer
realm.description: It is a simple role. The role indicates a user can create a content (like creating a new phone, computer, post and so on)

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token
